definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])
particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
he; him (used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)
